name: Earthquake Relief & Rescue Simulator: Play the rescue sniffer dog to Help earthquake victims.
name_original: Earthquake Relief & Rescue Simulator: Play the rescue sniffer dog to Help earthquake victims.
description:
Sever earthquake has shaken your city, building and road are broken, injured people are stuck in many places. Which need your help, Injured people are waiting for rescue. As the premier sniffer dog you can detect the stuck people who are asking for help. Trace them, Find them and get the first aid to them.
Mission are designed for education and learning to be able to rescue people in the time of natural calamities. Kids and adult both can play game get the feeling of people in these conditions and help them maximum.

Best Game Features.
-> Earthquake hit city environment
-> Real world rescue conditions
-> Missions based on real world challenges
-> Search and Rescue practice for everyone,
-> More missions will be coming soon


Privacy Policy
We don't collect any personal information , any non-personal information collected by our partners like Google is used

for analytic and game improvements.
